text: Nanimono mo, hitobito no shinkō o samatageru mono wanai. Sudeni kare-ra (makka no fushinjin-sha-tachi) ni onmichibiki ga kudattakara, omo ni yurushi o koeba yoi. Samonakereba mukashi no mono no (kabutta yōna) koto ga kare-ra o osou ka, matawa chōbatsu ga, madjikaku kare-ra ni kudaru soto arumai
